citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Several of the outdoor portion of the shelter building enclosures were noticed to be covered in approximately 50-75% of
feces, making it difficult for the dogs to avoid walking in fecal material. The accumulation of fecal material was noted in:
four enclosures housing a total of eleven adult Boxers, one enclosure housing two adult Boston Terriers, one enclosure
housing three adult Golden Retrievers, one enclosure housing two approximately 2–3-month-old puppies (one
Pomeranian and one Sheba Inu) and one enclosure housing four approximately 3–4-month-old puppies (one Boxer, two
Golden Retrievers, and one Sheba Inu). Enclosures that are not kept clean increases risks of disease hazards, insects,
and pests. The licensee must ensure that excreta be removed from enclosures daily and as often as necessary to prevent
accumulation.
Correct by November 7, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Several of the outdoor portion of the shelter building enclosures were noticed to be covered in approximately 50-75% of 
feces, making it difficult for the dogs to avoid walking in fecal material. The accumulation of fecal material was noted in: 
four enclosures housing a total of eleven adult Boxers, one enclosure housing two adult Boston Terriers, one enclosure 
housing three adult Golden Retrievers, one enclosure housing two approximately 2–3-month-old puppies (one 
Pomeranian and one Sheba Inu) and one enclosure housing four approximately 3–4-month-old puppies (one Boxer, two 
Golden Retrievers, and one Sheba Inu). Enclosures that are not kept clean increases risks of disease hazards, insects, 
and pests. The licensee must ensure that excreta be removed from enclosures daily and as often as necessary to prevent 
accumulation.  
Correct by November 7, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
